articles.title: Ukraine, Russia set to sign deal to reopen grain export ports
articles.description: Russia and Ukraine will sign a deal on Friday to reopen Ukrainian Black Sea ports for grain exports, Turkey and the United Nations said, raising hopes that an international food crisis aggravated by the Russian invasion can be eased.

articles.title: GOP leaders won't get in the way of Trump 2024
articles.description: Most top Hill Republicans would rather he not announce before November. But that doesn't mean they're prepared to boost any rivals — setting up a 2016 redux.
